column5: Why are you on other boards?? LOL
interesting technique.  Thanks for sharing. anyone have ideas for franken baits?   forrest
umm..."i don't know the wind just kinda pushed me that way"! lol
Neat idea, I bet there are not many bass out there that have seen a bait like that.
Hey Splashopper---You gotta be A fellow Robbie fan to use that quote---no?  Bushart
yep.. i like his stuff too
I have some baits already made like that from the company.  The same coulour and everything.  I sure as heck didn't catch a bass that big.
If youwant a bigger tube bait you can always buy a Lindy Tiger tube in 6" or 9".   There's also the Yum Doozie Tube which comes in 5.5", 6", & 8". It's long and thin. The SM on St. Clair love them.
